QuestData.Title: A Needle in a Hellhole
QuestData.Description: You and I can't take on an army, $n. They'll overwhelm us. That's why we've got to stick to Troteman's plan.$b$bThe next part of the plan is going to require a bit of subtlety... something that I'm not terribly good at. That's where you come in.$b$bSpeak with Thelaron Direneedle, the tailor here in town. I've already given him the hides and mud that we've collected. He's going to need to size you.$b$bThat's right, $n: you're going undercover.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thelaron Direneedle at Chiselgrip in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: You need a disguise? Well, you came to the right place, $g honey: sister;.$b$bLet me take a look... mm-hmm. I know exactly what we'll do.
